subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which was the former capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur?
question_hi: राजस्थान में पहले बना राजधानी क्या थी ?
explanation_en: Kishangarh was the former capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur. It was the capital from 1764 to 1803 when it was taken over by Sawai Jai Singh II and made Jaipur the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: किशनगारह राजस्थान के पहले राजधानी थी। इसने 1764 में शुरू हुए और सौवाई जय सिंगीस एंड्रो II ने शुरू हुए और Jaipur राजधानी कर दी।
explanation_en: Kishangarh was the former capital of Rajasthan. Sawai Jai Singh II took over in 1764 and made Jaipur the capital of Rajasthan.
